name: Motdifier
body:
MOTDifier ======== Simple "Message of the Day" Script Author: ------- Sebastian Kaiser LICENCE: -------- MIT Description: ------------ * script as php or bash / shell script * for usage in crontab * php file will overwrite the /etc/motd file * shell script will output the motd - u have to pipe the output into /etc/motd Example Output: ------------
